doc.title: Liftoff! An Astronaut's Journey
doc.plot: A documentary, this film takes you behind the scenes and into space, covering astronaut training, the rescue of a 12-ton LDEF satellite during a low earth orbit, the Columbia's night landing, the launch of one of the Navy's SYNCOM satellites, exclusive interviews, and official NASA footage. The film features the five-person crew of the STS-32, a mission aboard the shuttle Columbia, and the narration of Patrick Stewart ("Star Trek: The Next Generation"). A portion of the proceeds were donated to the Challenger Center.
